Author: DriftlessDigits
Name: Scrooge
Description: "You might say that everythin's for sale here in Ul'dah — as long as you've got the gil." — Momodi Modi
Punchline: A gil saved is a gil earned.
Changelog: Added Pinch Run Timer — countdown ETA during pinch runs with progress tracking, final elapsed time on completion, and a persisted per-item average for instant estimates.
